posts.post_content:
Most of these will be sold well below PSA values... Many tough commons, below is a partial list. I also have between 55-60 PSA 7's if interested....

Larry Doyle (bat) SCap 350 SGC 88
Rube Kissinger SCap 350 fact 25(tough common and back) SGC 88
Howie Camnitz (arm at side) SCap 350-460 SGC 88
Fred Merkle (Port.) Pied 150 SGC 86 (50/50 centering, razor corners)
Rube Manning (pitching) Pied 350 SGC 86 (extremely low pop common, toughest in the entire set!)
Hugh Jennings (both hands show) SCap 350 SGC 86
George Brown (Chi.) Pied 150 SGC 86 (impossible common in high grade)
Bill O'Hara (N.Y.) Pied 350 SGC 86 (very difficult in high grade, low pop)
Ed Willett (Detroit) Pied 350 SGC 86
Tony Thebo Old Mill SGC 84, tough SLer... *SOLD**
Russ Ford Sov. 460 SGC 84
Jerry Freeman Pied 350, large borders.. **SOLD**
Boss Schmidt (Port.) Pied 350 SGC 84 (card looks like an 8 or better)
Lefty Leifield (Pitching) Pied 150 SGC 84
Jim Stephens SCap 350 SGC 84
Red Ames (Port.) SCap 150 SGC 82 (very tough common)
Frank Oberlin Pied 350 SGC 80 (huge borders, largest I've ever seen)
Frank Smith (Chi. & Bost.) Pied 350-460 SGC 70 (perfect centering, rare)
Larry Doyle (throwing) Pied 150 SGC 70 (huge borders, very tough common)
Hal Chase (dark cap) Sovereign 460 SGC 60 (extremely tough combo)
Johnny Evers (blue back, cubs shirt) Pied 150 SGC 55 (card looks like a 6!)...**SOLD**
Joe Tinker (Port., rare Orange color variation!) Pied 150 SGC 60 (perfect centering) **SOLD**
Solly Hofman BLeaf 350 SGC 10 (SGC 20 sold for over $4K!, no PSA grades show on Pop report)
Any Dummy Taylor or Carlton Molesworth?
Hofman BLeaf 350 for only $525! Tinker Port. Orange SGC 60 $850....
Kev, received the Tinker portrait today.  Very, very nice card.  Thanks.
